title: Letters from Thomas Percy, D.D. :
snippet: He took his last illness, and died in Kennedy's Closs, first court thereof on your left hand, 1st house in the turnpike above the tavern there; and in Queen Anne's time this was told to his family and friends, (who resided in that house,) by Sir James Stewart of Goodtrees, Lord Advocate.

title: The Lauderdale papers.
author: Lauderdale, John Maitland

title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: SirJames Stewart of Goodtrees, named in his stead, was a Presbyterian of the morerigid sort, such as were usually called fanatics.
